channel.title: Need client help
channel.description: My client normally works just fine. Except this time i went to update it i ran into a problem. I didn't change anything but the name of the client. Anyways it runs just fine until I make it a .rar file. As soon as I do that the client won't run, says something about not being able to find or load the main class gui. Can someone help me?

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

My client won’t even run with that code…
Thank you for trying though.

Read full topic

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @I96 I96
item.description:
@I96 wrote:

[code]Well I just took the code from Near Reality’s run and edited it a littel bit, but this should work for a 64 or 86 bit computer. If the main class in your client isn’t Gui just change the Gui in the code to whatever it is, according to the code you put it should be EGUI.

@echo off
title SERVER NAME - Loading
color E

:start
echo.
echo ------------------------------------------------
echo       SERVER NAME (x64), Starting up...
echo ------------------------------------------------
if exist "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/"  goto x64
goto x86


:x64
title          SERVER NAME (x64) - Loader
echo         Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo    . C l i e n t   o u t p u t   b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit


:x86
title          SERVER NAME (x86) - Loader
echo         Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo    . C l i e n t   o u t p u t   b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files/Java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

@echo off
title LimitBreaker!
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI
pause

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @I96 I96
item.description:
@I96 wrote:

just sounds like u shud change ur run.bat code… It can run because it’s looking for a version of jdk that wasnt installed so it did that… Could you edit ur run.bar change the “exit” at the bottom and make it “pause” and copy and paste the code here?

Read full topic

item.title: Need client help
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

This is where I get confused.
When I unzip it on my desktop, the computer that my original client is also on, it will work.
But when I or anyone else unzips it on a different computer, the cmd will pop up for only a second and then disappear and nothing happens.

Edit: Ok so I downloaded jdk 6 update 27 on my laptop and the client worked. Don’t know what the problem is but that seems like a fix for now. If you can figure out another fix please let me know.

Read full topic
